name: Sky Puppy
description:
In this little puzzle, the player is supposed to make a clear path for a dog that is trapped in a house on fire. By pushing the furniture or putting out the fire, you can clear the path, so you can guide the dog right out the door! Be quick!

Have fun =)

Team:
Nielisson - Artist, Game Design, Programming
Thrilmur - Sound Designer (https://thrilmur.itch.io/)
HPCA - Lead Programmer

Don't buy or breed, adopt <3
